original_text: For the people were numbered, and, behold, there were none of the inhabitants of Jabeshgilead there.
korean_text: 백성을 계수할 때에 야베스 길르앗 주민이 하나도 거기 없음을 보았음이라

sentences.original_text: there were none of the inhabitants of Jabeshgilead there
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 야베스길르앗 거민이 한 사람도 없었더라
